cause.description:
It's hard to get away from Abuse in this day in age. But there are ways out of it and people to go too. Please invite everyone who is against it, family, or friends, join, lets stop All Abuse.
And If your encouraged to Donate please don't hesitate.
1. Stop Domestic Abuse
2. Raise Funds
3. Enforce the Law
cause.name: Against Domestic Abuse
